sentences.en: Among the blue - green algae are many species of nitrogen fixation.
sentences.cn: 许多种蓝藻有固氮的能力.

sentences.en: As you can see, he's got quite a fixation with this object in his head.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到, 他特别关注这个东西.

sentences.en: But they don't stare with a kind of fixation that I do, trying to make contact with whatever is going on even if I never talk to the person or touch the person or have anything do with the person.
sentences.cn: 但他们不会一直固定地盯着一个人看,想知道那个人在想什么发生了什么事,即使我不和那个人说话,不碰那个人,并且和那个人没有任何关系。

sentences.en: Clearly aqueous preservative systems must possess a fixation mechanism.
sentences.cn: 显然,水溶性防腐剂必须有固定的历程.

sentences.en: Fixation wires are used routinely for the treatment of fractures and dislocations.
sentences.cn: 钢丝固定被常规应用于骨折和脱位的治疗中.

sentences.en: He has a fixation about her.
He's got this fixation with cleanliness.
Internal fracture fixation material is now an indispensable material in bone repair.
sentences.cn: 骨折内固定材料是骨修复中不可或缺的重要材料.

sentences.en: Method: To present the technique of endobrow lift and transcalvarial suture fixation.
sentences.cn: 方法: 经头骨固定法行内视镜上额拉皮.

sentences.en: Mycorhizae perform the function of nitrogen fixation and storage.
sentences.cn: 菌根起着固氮和贮氮的作用.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluated the fixation nature of macular hole.
sentences.cn: 目的评价黄斑裂孔的视力性质.

sentences.en: Posterior screw fixation is commonly used for posterior fusion of atlantoaxial complexes.
sentences.cn: 后路螺钉固定技术已逐渐成为后路寰枢融合的主流.

sentences.en: Session fixation allows intruders to intercept authenticated sessions or to create new sessions and to capture the session identifier.
sentences.cn: 会话固定允许入侵者截获验证后的会话，或者创建新会话并捕获会话标识符。

sentences.en: Some organic systems involve more complex fixation.
sentences.cn: 一些有机体系还牵涉到比较复杂的凝固.

sentences.en: Such a fixation with money can't be healthy.
sentences.cn: 这般地迷恋钱财可能是病态的.

sentences.en: The country's fixation on the war may delay a serious examination of domestic needs.
sentences.cn: 该国对这场战争的执迷可能会令其不能及时认真地审视国内需求。

sentences.en: The fixation of the stapes may progress rapidly during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕期镫骨固定可能迅速发展.

sentences.en: The focus of pleasure shifts to the genitals and fixation can lead to excessive masculinity in females or in males, or, if you're female, need for attention or domination.
sentences.cn: 性器官成为了快乐的主要来源,固着在此阶段，会导致女性或男性,过分男性化，或是导致女性产生对于关注或控制的欲求。
